name: Akabeth Tactics
description: Akabeth Tactics is a turn-based tactical puzzle game where you play as the vampire Liel, trying to infiltrate into King Cassius' castle and usurpe the throne. Solve challenging positioning puzzles through fixed levels, in a gothic tone.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 310 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 650 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space
